mapper.update: insert into duty_document(dd_number, dd_title, dd_content, dd_date, dd_mem_number, dd_code_number, dd_public) values('dd'||dd_seq.nextVal, #{dd_title}, #{dd_content}, #{dd_date}, #{dd_mem_number}, #{dd_code_number}, #{dd_public})
